title: What is going on with ranked?
body: so i played a game of ranked, it was laggy as hell even did the dumb alt enter thing that riot said, and it was laggy as hell and couldn't move, my fps didnt drop and my ping stayed less than 60, thought it still might be my comp so i played a normal game and had no issue, played a aram game and had no issue, so what the hell is going on? went back and played a ranked game and there is is laggy as hell and moveing doesnt want to always work, what is going on with ranked?

replies.body:
This happens to me too. Its spaghetti code. We just have to wait for them to fix it. I'm sure we are talking about the same thing. The game stutters all the time especially when enemies are near. I can't win a single game.
GTX 980
i7 3770k
8 GB RAM
Ethernet connection 40ms
Overlays report a constant 60 fps although that is false
ive jumped from 39 ping to 43. riot pls fix
